package.name: smacha
package.description: SMACHA (short for "State Machine Assembler", pronounced "smasha") aims at distilling the task-level simplicity of SMACH into compact YAML-based scripts in the foreground, while retaining all of its power and flexibility in Jinja2-based templates and a custom code generation engine in the background.
package.author: Barry Ridge
Timotej Gaspar
